reviews.review_msg: Simply THE BEST PROF you can ever have for a hard and annoying course. She makes everything so easy to understand!
I dont normally rate profs on this site, but she deserves a good rating. I recommend taking every course you can with her

She is definitely one of the best professors at SFU. Very approachable and will go out of her way to help students. Assignments might seem long, but are the most helpful resources (she likes picking questions from assignments and quizzes for midterms)!
She's awesome. Great teaching style and attitude. Really approachable, helpful, and very easy on the eyes.

The amount of enthusiasm she shows is contagious amongst students.Attending her class makes you want to learn in such an important course. Always available to help students.                    (with that nice attitude its really hard to miss her lectures, even at 8.30am in the morning :))
BEST PROFESSOR!!! I really like her attitude towards students. doesn't have Professor kinda attitude at all and so, every student will absolutely love the way she teaches and interact.
She is really nice. Exams are easy. she wants you to get a good mark!
Homa is a really nice professor. Very enthusiastic about what she's teaching.
